# BgmiGet

## How to Install

```
pip install git+https://github.com/aoout/BgmiGet.git@dev 
```

## Basic Usage

Search anime by search "commnad".

```
bgmiget search '因为太怕痛' 7 "sc" "桜都字幕组"
>0  -> 【因为太怕痛...】【07】【桜都字幕组】
```

Then, download anime by index.

```
bgmiget download 0
```
